body.description: Studio start request containing optional configuration overrides for resource allocations and labels when starting the session.

gpu.description: Number of GPUs allocated to the Studio session.

cpu.description: Number of CPUs allocated to the Studio session.

memory.description: Amount of memory in MiB allocated to the Studio session.

mountData.description: Array of data-link IDs mounted in the Studio session.

environment.description: Array of environment variable key-value pairs set in the Studio session.

condaEnvironment.description: Conda package specification for custom packages installed in the Studio environment.

lifespanHours.description: Number of hours the Studio session will run before automatically stopping. A value of `0` indicates unlimited lifespan.
